description:
A Truly unique Egg Making experience!

FunTime 3D eDesigner Easter edition is the most unique 3D app in the market allowing you to fully customize your own 3D Easter Egg! Choose from various colors and designs for a truly unique Egg that you can share with the world!

Its EASY TO USE:

Step 1 - Choose a Title and Border Color for your final image

Step 2 - Using your fingers rotate and move your Egg in 3D while you go through each zone to customize the Color and Texture

Step 3 - SHARE WITH THE WORLD Via Email or other options available on your device (Requires Internet Connection and Email App to be setup on your device). You can even choose to have your Egg rotate around as a screensaver!

This App is great for EASTER but it will also work well for other holidays and special occasions such as:

-Mothers Day
-Fathers Day
-Thanksgiving
-Christmas
-Valentines Day
  MORE

FunTime 3D eDesigner Easter Edition is sure to please! But don't just take our word for it, go ahead and get your copy today and see why this app is a MUST HAVE!

FEATURES:

• Full 3D Interface
• Customizable Egg
• Choose Final Image Title and Border Color
• Choose from over 50 various textures PER zone
• 4 Zones on Egg to Design in FULL 3D
• Choose various colors per zone
• TRUE CUSTOMIZATION of Easter Egg
• Share your creations via Email and other options (Requires that your email is setup on device)
• Most unique Egg Design app currently available in market!
• MADE FOR EASTER, Perfect for other holidays as well such as Mothers Day, Fathers Day, Valentines Day, Christmas and MORE!
